main event: A witness observed a UFO in Enid, Oklahoma on April 6, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as being 4 feet in diameter and shaped like a light bulb., The sighting lasted for less than 1 minute., The object traveled from east to west without illuminating its flight path., The report concluded it was a meteor based on the observations., Weather conditions were clear and calm during the sighting.
sighted object: a round object, approximately 4 feet in diameter
witness description: principle observer is a 51-year-old male from Enid, Oklahoma
